item.title: Preserving code that shaped generations: Zork I, II, and III go Open Source
item.description: Microsoft’s Open Source Programs Office (OSPO), Team Xbox, and Activision are making Zork I, Zork II, and Zork III available under the MIT License.

item.title: Android and iPhone users can now share files, starting with the Pixel 10 family.
item.description: Today, we’re introducing a way for Quick Share to work with AirDrop.

item.title: Firefox 147 Will Support The XDG Base Directory Specification
item.description: A 21 year old bug report requesting support of the XDG Base Directory specification is finally being addressed by Firefox

item.title: Red Alert 2: Chrono Divide
item.description: Play now, in your web browser!

item.title: Introducing Nano Banana Pro
item.description: Nano Banana Pro is our new image generation and editing model from Google DeepMind.

item.title: The EU wants to kill cookie banners by moving consent to your browser
item.description: The EU wants to end annoying cookie pop-ups by letting users set their consent once in their browser. If passed, websites will have to respect those choices.

item.title: What AI is Really For - Christopher Butler
item.description: After three years of immersion in AI, I have come to a relatively simple conclusion: it’s a useful technology that is very likely overhyped to the

item.title: The Patent Office Is About To Make Bad Patents Untouchable
item.description: The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) has proposed new rules that would effectively end the public’s ability to challenge improperly granted patents at the Patent Office itself. We need EFF supporters to file public comments opposing these rules this week. The USPTO is moving quickly, and staying silent will only help those who profit from abusive patents.

item.title: Don’t Refactor Like Uncle Bob (Second Edition)

item.title: SAM 3
item.description: With SAM 3 you can use text and visual prompts to precisely identify, segment, and follow any object in images or videos—coming soon to Instagram Edits and Vibes on the Meta AI app.
